message.name: ERR_NO_IMAGE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: You must specify an image. If you did specify one, it has a 0 file size and is invalid.

message.name: ERR_CROSSED_XRV_MAXIMUM_IMAGE_SIZE
message.locale: The uploaded data is too large (%1n) - Maximum size allowed is '%2n'.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_FV_ENVIRONMENT_PROPERTY_VALUE
message.locale: The value of '%1s' that is configured for the application property '%2s' is invalid, and therefore the default value of the application property of '%3s' was used.
